name: Save.Eat.Kill.
description:
Info

It's year 8.134C-24 and you've landed onto an alien planet to protect and evacuate their primitive medieval life-forms before the invasive species take over. You will do your duty and deliver the villagers to the spaceship, but you need to get stronger. Perhaps you could even munch on a local... or two? Yum.

This game is a submission to One Game A Month #15 with the theme Antihero, and was developed by a team of 6 during August '22.

How to play

You control the main (anti)hero.

Follow the path into village, fight your way through the aggressive aliens.

Once you reach the village, walk near a villager or the front of the hut for the little green aliens to start heading to their safe haven (bottom left hand corner).

If any villager reaches the safe haven, you win the day.

You only need one villager be saved to win, the rest can be had for lunch...

Controls
  • WASD - Directional movement
  • Mouse Movement- rotates direction the player faces
  • LMB - Meele Attack
  • RMB - Eat  - works on Green Alien\Brown Alien, gain health and max health
  • Space - Dash 
Team Programming
  • Venetia Pereira
Art and Visuals
  • Graph
